item.title: 丝绸之路》为何历时七年制作完成
item.description:
这款备受期待的独立游戏已经制作了很长时间，以至于成为了网络流行语 

。【原文：

The highly anticipated indie game has been in production for so long that it’s become an internet meme 

】

item.title: 巴拿马财政数据降低评级为 "绩差 "的风险，巴拿马债券跳涨
item.description: 巴拿马主权债券的交易价格接近约一年来的最高点，原因是第二季度财政数据的改善提高了这个中美洲国家避免被降级为垃圾级的可能性。【原文：Panama’s sovereign bonds are trading near the highest in about a year as an improvement in second-quarter fiscal data raised the odds of the Central American nation skirting a downgrade to junk.】

item.title: 交易商寻求美联储信号，外汇波动率降至八月正常值以下
item.description: 今年 8 月，货币市场的波动性打破了历史规律，不仅没有出现通常的季节性反弹，反而降至一年来的最低点。【原文：Volatility in the currency market is breaking with historical patterns this August, sliding to the lowest in a year instead of staging a usual seasonal rebound.】

item.title: 价格增长放缓，美国现房销售上升
item.description: 由于价格增长放缓和抵押贷款利率走低，7 月份美国旧房销售量小幅上升，这有助于稳定需求。【原文：Sales of previously owned US homes rose modestly in July as price growth slowed and mortgage rates drifted lower, helping to stabilize demand.】

item.title: 美国制造业因需求而以 2022 年以来最快速度扩张
item.description: 美国制造业正以三年多来最快的速度扩张，原因是需求强劲，这也助长了持续的通胀压力。【原文：US manufacturing is expanding at the fastest rate in more than three years on stronger demand that's also fueling sustained inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 评级公司称 Braskem 正在耗尽最后的支持
item.description: 在长达数年的行业低迷和不断攀升的环境灾难成本中，石化公司 Braskem SA 一直有一个重要的救命稻草，那就是其巨额的现金储备。现在，就连这一支柱也被侵蚀殆尽。【原文：Throughout a years-long industry downturn and the spiraling cost of an environmental disaster, petrochemical company Braskem SA has had one major saving grace — its hefty cash reserves. Now, even that pillar of support is being eroded away.】

item.title: Blackstone 在电气化领域再下 16 亿美元赌注
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 已达成收购电气设备服务供应商 Shermco 的交易，这是其对电气化日益重要的作用的最新押注。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has struck a deal to acquire electrical equipment services provider Shermco in its latest bet on the increasingly critical role of electrification.】

item.title: 美国军方的神秘太空飞机可能地平线有限
item.description: 美国太空部队的 X-37B 号朦胧太空飞机正准备执行第八次漫长的轨道任务，但它在超级大国快速扩张的太空防御努力（如 "金顶 "计划）中所起的作用可能有限— 有翼飞船的未来尚不明确。【原文：As the US Space Force’s shadowy spaceplane, the X-37B, prepares for an eighth lengthy orbital mission, its role in the superpower’s fast-expanding space defense efforts such as Golden Dome may be limited — and the future of winged spacecraft is unclear.】

item.title: 英国制裁伊朗石油大亨，打击伦敦对冲基金
item.description: 英国制裁了一名伊朗商业巨头及其网络中的几家重要公司，这是对伊斯兰共和国最有影响力的石油贸易帝国之一进行的一系列打击行动中的最新行动。【原文：The UK sanctioned an Iranian business magnate and several key firms in his network, the latest in a series of clampdowns on one of the Islamic Republic’s most influential oil trading empires.】

item.title: 沃尔玛业绩不佳，申请失业救济人数上升，美国股指期货下跌
item.description: 周四上午，美国股市期货下跌，此前零售业领头羊沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc.【原文：US equity futures declined Thursday morning after retail bellwether Walmart Inc. posted a rare profit miss and as weekly jobless claims came in higher than expected.】

item.title: 东方海外预计美国征税将在关税不确定性中对公司造成影响
item.description: 东方海外国际有限公司（Orient Overseas International Ltd.）警告说，额外征收的港口税可能会对该公司产生负面影响，但关税不确定性下全球贸易模式的转变可能会给航运业带来机遇。【原文：Orient Overseas International Ltd. warned that additional port levies imposed could negatively impact the firm, but shifting global trade patterns amid tariff uncertainties could bring opportunities to the shipping sector.】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数上升，劳动力市场放缓迹象加剧
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数上周升至 6 月份以来的最高水平，持续申请人数也在攀升，这进一步证明美国劳动力市场正在放缓。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits rose last week to the highest level since June and continuing claims climbed, adding to evidence the US labor market is slowing.】

item.title: 三星支持的芯片制造商 Axelera AI 寻求融资 1.5 亿欧元
item.description: Axelera AI是一家由三星电子公司和欧盟支持的初创芯片制造商，该公司正在商谈融资1.5亿欧元（约合1.75亿美元），以加强欧洲大陆的高性能计算能力。【原文：Axelera AI, a startup chipmaker backed by Samsung Electronics Co. and the European Union, is in talks to raise more than €150 million ($175 million) in financing as the continent aims to strengthen its high-performance computing capacity.】

item.title: 美联储施密德称抵押贷款申请应减少文书工作
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰弗里-施密德（Jeffrey Schmid）在回答有关美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）抵押贷款欺诈指控的问题时说："作为美联储内部的专业人士，我们有责任。我相信她会处理好她需要处理的事情"。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City President Jeffrey Schmid, in response to a question about mortgage fraud allegations against Fed Governor Lisa Cook, says, “We have responsibilities as professionals inside the Federal Reserve. I’m sure she’ll handle matters that she needs to handle.”】

item.title: Invesco 称国债在利率方面比欧洲债券更有吸引力
item.description: Invesco Ltd.高级投资组合经理Alessio de Longis表示，随着美联储降息的呼声越来越高，美国国债的传统避风港地位重新确立，国债是比欧洲债券更好的投资品种。高级投资组合经理 Alessio de Longis 表示。【原文：Treasuries are a better investment than European bonds as the case for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts mounts and the traditional haven status of US government debt is reestablished, according to Invesco Ltd. Senior Portfolio Manager, Alessio de Longis.】

item.title: 土耳其通过新的航运限制措施收紧以色列贸易禁令
item.description: 土耳其扩大了对其港口与以色列之间航运的限制，试图进一步严格遵守因加沙战争而实施的贸易禁令。【原文：Turkey expanded restrictions on shipping between its ports and Israel, seeking to further tighten compliance with a trade ban imposed over the war in Gaza.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克仍认为 2025 年将降息一次，但将关注劳动力问题
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，他仍然认为今年有可能降息一次，这与他 6 月份的预测一致，但他补充说，劳动力市场的发展轨迹 "可能令人担忧"，值得关注。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he still sees one interest-rate cut as likely for this year, in line with his projection in June, but added the labor-market trajectory is “potentially troubling” and bears watching.】

item.title: 农民销售放缓，小麦升幅扩大至一周高点
item.description: 芝加哥小麦期货连续第二个交易日上涨，原因是农民抑制销售，限制了谷物的近期供应。【原文：Chicago wheat futures rose for a second session as farmers hold back sales, constraining near-term availability of the grain.】

item.title: ETF 转换增长，共同基金再亏损 4320 亿美元
item.description: 共同基金的资产在不断流失，而它们的 ETF 基金却在不断刷新纪录。现在，从拉扎德（Lazard）到安本集团（Aberdeen Group Plc.【原文：Mutual funds are bleeding assets anew, just as their ETF cousins break fresh records. Now, firms from Lazard to Aberdeen Group Plc. are pushing to convert traditional funds into exchange-traded ones, even as regulators look poised to bless a structure that would allow both to coexist in peace.】

item.title: 纽约市环球广场债券持有人面临 4.88 亿美元损失
item.description: 购买了 7.05 亿美元与曼哈顿 Worldwide Plaza 大厦挂钩的商业抵押债券的基金经理们面临着巨大损失的风险，因为在主要租户离开后，该物业的估价被大幅下调。【原文：Money managers who bought a $705 million commercial-mortgage bond tied to Manhattan’s Worldwide Plaza building are at risk of substantial losses after the property’s appraisal was slashed amid the departure of key tenants.】

item.title: 加密钱包提供商 MetaMask 将利用 Stripe 的桥接提供稳定币
item.description: 领先的加密钱包提供商 MetaMask 正在与支付巨头 Stripe 公司的稳定币部门 Bridge 和去中心化稳定币平台 M0 合作，推出自己的稳定币。【原文：Leading crypto wallet provider MetaMask is launching its own stablecoin in partnership with payment giant Stripe Inc.’s stablecoin arm, Bridge, and decentralized stablecoin platform M0.】

item.title: 科技巨头准备挑战国家人工智能法规
item.description: 包括OpenAI、Meta Platforms Inc.和Alphabet Inc.旗下谷歌公司在内的科技公司正加紧阻止美国各州对其快速发展、利润丰厚的人工智能业务进行监管。【原文：Tech companies including OpenAI, Meta Platforms Inc. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google are revving up to block US states from regulating their fast-moving and lucrative artificial intelligence businesses.】

item.title: 干旱的得克萨斯州牧场为页岩水问题提供了解决方案
item.description:
二叠纪盆地的石油公司正在探索海水淡化，以回收压裂废水用于农业。【原文：

Oil companies in the Permian Basin are exploring desalination to recycle fracking wastewater for agricultural use.

】

item.title: 咖啡因霜冻损失和套期保值减少而维持在两个月高位附近
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡的价格接近两个月来的最高点，原因是交易商了解到霜冻造成的损害，而且烘焙商有限的对冲行为鼓励了对冲基金的购买。【原文：Arabica coffee held near the highest in two months as traders accessed frost damage and limited hedging by roasters encouraged hedge fund buying.】

item.title: 荷兰能源公司 TenneT 债务担保后吸引投资者兴趣
item.description: MUFG Securities 在 7 月份对 TenneT Holding BV 的债券进行了超过 5 亿美元的交易，这标志着在荷兰政府批准债务担保后，市场对这家荷兰电力公司产生了浓厚的兴趣。【原文：MUFG Securities executed over $500 million of trades in TenneT Holding BV’s bonds in July, marking a flurry of interest in the Dutch electricity firm after the government approved a debt guarantee.】

item.title: Vattenfall 将选择 GE Vernova 或 Rolls-Royce 生产新反应堆
item.description: 瑞典 Vattenfall AB 公司将其核反应堆供应商的选择范围缩小到 GE Vernova 公司和劳斯莱斯控股公司的一个部门，因为该公司计划新建机组，以帮助满足未来几十年激增的电力需求。【原文：Sweden’s Vattenfall AB narrowed its choice of suppliers for nuclear reactors to GE Vernova Inc. and a division of Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc, as it plans new units to help meet surging power demand in the decades ahead.】

item.title: 美联储主席竞选人布拉德支持 2025 年削减 100 个基点
item.description: 前圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长詹姆斯-布拉德（James Bullard）是下一任美国央行行长的竞争者，他呼吁今年降息一个百分点，并在2026年进一步降息。【原文：Former Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President James Bullard, a contender for the next US central bank chief, called for a percentage point of interest-rate cuts this year, with scope to do more in 2026.】

item.title: 奇货可居：美联储施密德谈杰克逊霍尔会议（播客）
item.description: 又到了杰克逊霍尔（Jackson Hole）时间，货币政策领域最杰出的人士将在怀俄明州田园诗般的环境中聚会，参加堪萨斯城联邦储备银行的年度货币政策研讨会。对市场而言，重头戏往往是周五上午美联储主席的讲话。但除此之外，央行行长和学者们总要讨论一个主题。为了拉开今年会议的帷幕，我们采访了美联储主席兼首席经济学家杰弗里-施密德（Jeffrey Schmid）。【原文：It’s Jackson Hole time again, when the most prominent minds in monetary policy meet in an idyllic Wyoming setting for the Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City’s annual symposium on monetary policy. For markets, the main event tends to be the speech from the Fed Chairman on Friday morning. But beyond that, there’s always a theme that central bankers and academics are tasked to discuss. So to raise the curtain for this year’s event, we spoke with none other than Jeffrey Schmid, the president and CE】

item.title: 卡瓦、奇波特尔沉沦，濒临死亡的竞争对手卷土重来
item.description: 随着通货膨胀和经济放缓开始对美国消费者造成影响，整个餐饮业的痛苦也在增加。Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc.、Cava Group Inc. 和 Sweetgreen Inc.即使是快餐业中最坚挺的麦当劳公司，也几乎跟不上大盘的步伐。【原文：As inflation and a slowing economy start taking their toll on the US consumer, the pain is mounting across the restaurant industry. Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc., Cava Group Inc. and Sweetgreen Inc. — hot names in what had been a booming fast-casual segment — have each sunk around 20% or more since reporting lackluster second-quarter earnings. Even McDonald’s Corp., among the most resilient of fast-food standbys, is barely keeping pace with the broader market.】
